reasoning: This is a read-and-create task with no code modifications. The todo folder exists at docs/todo/ with one markdown file containing 7 predefined tasks. Implementation only requires reading the file and using the TodoWrite tool - no external integrations, no infrastructure changes, no new dependencies.

scope.notes: No files will be modified. Task only involves reading docs/todo/vindicate-tasks.md and using the TodoWrite tool to create tasks from its contents.

integrations.notes: Uses only the built-in TodoWrite tool. No external APIs or services involved.

infrastructure.notes: No infrastructure impact. Pure read-and-tool-use operation.

knowledge.notes: Simple markdown parsing and TodoWrite tool usage - well-documented patterns already exist.

risk.notes: Creating todo items cannot break any existing functionality. Worst case is incorrect task formatting which is easily correctable.

validation_recommendations.reasoning: No functional code is being modified. This task only reads a markdown file and creates todo items using a built-in tool. Zero risk to codebase functionality.

task_details.task_summary: 7 Phase 0 Foundation tasks (0.1-0.7) covering project restructuring, core models, audit trails, agent interfaces, pipeline types, exceptions, and configuration
